issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw: @sringer99, Nathan pointed out above that we won't have access to the 'world' frame during the final.  I'm not sure how that will affect the controllers, but it sounds like 'world' won't be available on the Field Computer side we won't be able to grab it to send it to ourselves.
content.html: @sringer99, Nathan pointed out above that we won't have access to the 'world' frame during the final. I'm not sure how that will affect the controllers, but it sounds like 'world' won't be available on the Field Computer side we won't be able to grab it to send it to ourselves.
